title: Schedule C - Profit or Loss From Business
description: Use Schedule C to report income or loss from a business you operated or a profession you practiced as a sole proprietor.

sections.title: Business Information
sections.description: Enter basic information about your business

fields.name: business_name
fields.label: Business Name
fields.help_text: Enter the name of your business as shown on your business documents

fields.name: business_code
fields.label: Business Code
fields.help_text: Enter the 6-digit code that identifies your main business activity

fields.name: business_address
fields.label: Business Address
fields.help_text: Enter the full address where your business is located

fields.name: accounting_method
fields.label: Accounting Method
fields.help_text: Select the accounting method used for your business

fields.name: first_business
fields.label: Is this your first year filing Schedule C for this business?
fields.help_text: Check if this is the first Schedule C you're filing for this business

sections.title: Income
sections.description: Report all income from your business during the tax year

fields.name: gross_receipts
fields.label: Gross receipts or sales
fields.help_text: Enter the total income from your business before deducting any expenses

fields.name: returns_allowances
fields.label: Returns and allowances
fields.help_text: Enter the total amount of refunds you gave to customers and any allowances you made for merchandise your customers kept but were unsatisfied with

fields.name: other_income
fields.label: Other business income
fields.help_text: Enter any other income from your business that isn't included in gross receipts

sections.title: Expenses
sections.description: Report the ordinary and necessary expenses for your business

fields.name: advertising
fields.label: Advertising
fields.help_text: Costs for advertising your business (flyers, business cards, online ads, etc.)

fields.name: vehicle_expenses
fields.label: Car and truck expenses
fields.help_text: Costs for business use of your vehicle

fields.name: commissions_fees
fields.label: Commissions and fees
fields.help_text: Amounts paid to others as commissions or fees for services

fields.name: contract_labor
fields.label: Contract labor
fields.help_text: Amounts paid to independent contractors for services

fields.name: depletion
fields.label: Depletion
fields.help_text: Depletion expenses for business assets

fields.name: depreciation
fields.label: Depreciation
fields.help_text: Depreciation expenses for business assets

fields.name: insurance
fields.label: Insurance (other than health)
fields.help_text: Business insurance costs excluding health insurance

fields.name: interest_mortgage
fields.label: Interest on mortgage
fields.help_text: Mortgage interest paid for business property

fields.name: interest_other
fields.label: Interest - other
fields.help_text: Interest paid on business loans and credit

fields.name: legal_professional
fields.label: Legal and professional services
fields.help_text: Fees paid for legal, accounting, and other professional services

fields.name: office_expenses
fields.label: Office expenses
fields.help_text: Office supplies and expenses

fields.name: pension_profit_sharing
fields.label: Pension and profit-sharing plans
fields.help_text: Contributions to employee pension and profit-sharing plans

fields.name: rent_lease_vehicles
fields.label: Rent/lease - vehicles, machinery, and equipment
fields.help_text: Amounts paid to rent or lease vehicles, machinery, or equipment for your business

fields.name: rent_lease_other
fields.label: Rent/lease - other
fields.help_text: Amounts paid to rent or lease other items for your business, such as office space

fields.name: repairs_maintenance
fields.label: Repairs and maintenance
fields.help_text: Costs for repairs and maintenance of business property

fields.name: supplies
fields.label: Supplies
fields.help_text: Costs for supplies that are not considered inventory

fields.name: taxes_licenses
fields.label: Taxes and licenses
fields.help_text: Business taxes and license fees

fields.name: travel
fields.label: Travel
fields.help_text: Business travel expenses (flights, hotels, etc.)

fields.name: meals
fields.label: Meals
fields.help_text: Business meal expenses (typically 50% deductible)

fields.name: utilities
fields.label: Utilities
fields.help_text: Utilities for your business (electricity, water, gas, phone, internet)

fields.name: wages
fields.label: Wages
fields.help_text: Wages paid to employees

fields.name: other_expenses
fields.label: Other expenses
fields.help_text: Description and amount of any other ordinary and necessary business expenses not listed above

sections.title: Vehicle Information
sections.description: If you claimed vehicle expenses, provide information about your vehicle use

fields.name: vehicle_description
fields.label: Vehicle Description
fields.help_text: Make, model, and year of your vehicle

fields.name: date_placed_in_service
fields.label: Date Vehicle Placed in Service
fields.help_text: Date you began using the vehicle for business purposes

fields.name: business_miles
fields.label: Business miles driven
fields.help_text: Total business miles driven during the tax year

fields.name: commuting_miles
fields.label: Commuting miles driven
fields.help_text: Miles driven commuting to and from work

fields.name: other_miles
fields.label: Other personal miles
fields.help_text: Miles driven for personal purposes other than commuting

fields.name: vehicle_questions
fields.label: Vehicle Use Questions
fields.help_text: Check all that apply to your vehicle use

options.label: Was the vehicle available for personal use during off-duty hours?
Do you have another vehicle available for personal use?
Do you have evidence to support your deduction?

sections.title: Home Office Deduction
sections.description: If you use part of your home regularly and exclusively for business, you may be able to claim a home office deduction

fields.name: home_office
fields.label: Do you use part of your home for business?
fields.help_text: Check if you use part of your home regularly and exclusively for business

fields.name: home_office_area
fields.label: Area used for business (square feet)
fields.help_text: Square footage of the area used for business

fields.name: home_total_area
fields.label: Total area of home (square feet)
fields.help_text: Total square footage of your home
